law.catch_line: In addition to any other applicable administrative or civil penalty, a premium finance company, insu...
law.text: In addition to any other applicable administrative or civil penalty, a premium finance company, insurer, or insurance producer that willfully and knowingly violates any provision of this title is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or both.
